message: “Great men are not born great, they grow great.”
author: — Mario Puzo

message: “The best way to predict your future is to create it.”
author: — Abraham Lincoln

message: “Peace is not absence of conflict, but the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.”
author: — Ronald Reagan

message: “To be a saint is to be an exception; to be a great man is to be a rule.”
author: — Victor Hugo

message: “The only thing that never fades is dignity.”
author: — Ralph Waldo Emerson

message: “A leader is best when people barely know he exists.”
author: — Lao Tzu

message: “The only thing necessary for evil to triumph is for good men to do nothing.”
author: — Edmund Burke

message: “Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.”
author: — Maya Angelou

message: “Onye ndụ n'obi bụ eze (A person with life in the heart is king).”
author: — Igbo Proverb
